add_members_copy: Looks like you haven’t added any users in this group yet
view_patients_profile_copy: Enable users to access and view the specified details within the profiles of patients assigned to them.
patient_triage_copy: Grant users permission to view the patient queue and edit their initial consultation forms and related information.
edit_patient_profile_copy: Grant users the ability to modify the profiles of patients assigned to them.
upload_doc_to_patient_copy: Enable users to upload documents to the profiles of patients assigned to them.
anaphylaxis_history: History of Anaphylaxis and adverse reactions
